name: TITAN DEMO
description:
NOTE: This game is in Spanglish.
NOTE2: This game is supposed to be played in full screen to take advantage of each pixel and avoid some graphic problems.

Description:
TITAN is an awesome space shooter in two dimensions, a classic game genere. You can choose between four spaceships to play in different planets and moons. Your mission is destroy the enemy ships that appear in the screen. You won if you destroy enough enemy ships.

Controls:
Arrows keys to move.
Space key to shoot.
Mouse to click buttons.

Tips:
-A generic enemy appear in the 5 levels.
-Every enemy ship type have different health.
-The giant enemy ship in the level 5 could destroy you with only one shot.
-If your two shots destroy an enemy ship, you will gain 2 points in the defeated bar.
-If you touch the orange star (Star Shooter), your bullets will be orange and longer, they will destroy more easily the enemy ships, also you gain 1 point of health.
-If you touch the blue moon (Moon Shield), you will gain 2 points of health.
-The health avoids you lose a live.

Known Bugs:
-If you click the spaceships or the planets/moons in the select menu, his color and function will be little glitchy, anyway this is not a big problem if you back to the main menu.
-In some PC the graphics looks bad, and the selector screen could look a little weird.
